pkgmetadata.longdescription: An IPFS-mirrored ebuild for UT2004 Community Bonus Pack 2. If you're unable to download it via IPFS for whatever reason, try searching the web for the file SHA1sums: 719095f073de635638696f71dbd9597e6ba903a5 cbp2-volume1_zip.zip dc6a08b5f2022590c2b0f86cc01535e7a2b6ff9d cbp2-volume2_zip.zip
